    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83486</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces of friction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte der Friktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces de frottement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças da fricção</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze di attrito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις της τριβής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas de la fricción</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that the forces of friction on fish (top) and on car (bottom) are in the opposite directions to their movement.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">car</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">movement</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß die Kräfte der 
Friktion auf den Fischen (ober) und auf Auto (Unterseite) seien Sie in
den entgegengesetzten Richtungen zu ihrer Bewegung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les forces du 
frottement sur des poissons (supérieurs) et sur la voiture (bas) 
soyez dans les directions opposées à leur mouvement.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as forças da 
fricção nos peixes (superiores) e no carro (fundo) esteja nos 
sentidos opostos a seu movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le forze di 
attrito sui pesci (superiori) e sull'automobile (parte inferiore) sia 
nei sensi opposti al loro movimento.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι οι δυνάμεις της τριβής
στα ψάρια (κορυφή) και στο αυτοκίνητο (κατώτατο σημείο) είναι 
στις αντίθετες κατευθύνσεις στη μετακίνησή τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las fuerzas de la 
fricción en los pescados (superiores) y en el coche (fondo) esté en 
las direcciones opuestas a su movimiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
